description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Types of Mankind: or Ethnological Researches ... illustrated by selections from the inedited papers of S. G. Morton ... and by additional contributions from L. Agassiz, W. Usher, and ... H. S. Patterson. ... By J. C. Nott and G. R. Gliddon.]" Author: NOTT, Josiah Clark. Contributor: MORTON, Samuel George. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10007.d.21." Page: 481 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1854 Edition: Sixth edition. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002678174 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
